overview:
Matthew Barkoff is a proven Senior Sales Executive with an entrepreneurial spirit in driving revenue growth for early, mid and late stage start ups.

Matthew currently serves as SVP of Sales, Media & Entertainment for Badgeville Inc, white-label platform for publishers looking to integrate social rewards into their websites.

He has a deep background successfully building teams, driving new revenue generation and working for organizations selling complex enterprise solutions.

Energetic sales leader who excels at mentoring and thrives in team based selling environments. Highly accomplished and successful growing early stage companies to record revenue growth and profitability.
